responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "28423EE24C236A40210E13B9CC566A12", "The Stonecutters Guild earns favors with the untrustworthy. In this part of the Riverlands, their reputation as its protectors is the tacit order among the chaos. Other peacekeepers gain little respect, as you might find they\'re rarely about. How the Stonecutters actually help people, I wouldn\'t know, but you won\'t find me committing any libel against them. You should take care not to aggravate them as well.")
name: MADD_0008_BrotherHugh_54
